name: City Park
description: Beautiful 50-acre park with walking trails, playgrounds, and picnic areas.

name: Historical Museum
description: Explore our city's rich history through interactive exhibits and artifacts.

name: Downtown Plaza
description: Vibrant shopping and dining district with weekly farmer's markets.

name: Riverwalk
description: Scenic 2-mile path along the river with beautiful views and wildlife.

name: Convention Center
description: State-of-the-art facility hosting conferences, trade shows, and events.

name: Art Gallery
description: Contemporary art space featuring local and national artists.

name: Sports Complex
description: Premier facility for tournaments with multiple fields and courts.

name: Botanical Gardens
description: Stunning display of native and exotic plants across 30 acres.
